project_abstract.cdata: The Third Highway Project has four principal components: (a) construction of two highway sections totalling 124 km to two-lane paved standard and two bridges between Menado, the capital of North Sulawesi, and a rice-producing area under development in the Dumoga Valley; (b) feasibility study of approximately 300 km of highway between Bandung and Cilicap in Java and 250 km of related feeder roads, and subsequent detailed engineering if justified; (c) technical assistance to DGH to prepare a program for the betterment of existing low-standard highways; (d) training of highway maintenance personnel.
